title: Name Change After 2 1/2 Years
body: I logged in today and was greeted with a forced name change screen, I've had my name since I started playing league around 2 1/2 years ago. The name is DrtyTrouserSnake and I honestly don't see how this is offensive, it discretely implies something sure, but I don't believe it is super obscene. Why am I getting a forced name change all of a sudden? It's been almost 3 years and I've grown so attached to the name it isn't right to force me to change it especially since it was probably reported by some pre-made who lost a game and Riot's "great" punishment system kicked in. If any Rioters are there, can you explain to me why I have to be forced to change my name after such a long time?

replies.body: Well, I'm guessing that name was most likely reported enough times for the system to pick up on a sexually explicit name that was cleverly crafted in order to not be picked up. In cases like yours, the name can be flagged if it gets reported enough times.
